articles.author: Kyle Wiggers
articles.title: Perplexity acquires Read.cv, a social media platform for professionals - TechCrunch
articles.description: Read.cv, a social media platform for professionals that competed with LinkedIn, has been acquired by AI-powered search engine Perplexity.
articles.content:
Read.cv, a social media platform for professionals that competed with LinkedIn, has been acquired by AI-powered search engine Perplexity.

articles.title: Russia and Iran move to strengthen military ties - BBC.com
articles.description: The two countries sign a 20-year treaty covering areas ranging from defence and technology to energy and trade.
articles.content:
Russia and Iran have agreed to closer military co-operation, in a move announced during a visit to Moscow by President Masoud Pezeshkian.
